text: Ba kofironi qavmat, (ki jagonagii Allohro inkor kardand), ʙiguj, ki agar ʙozistand az kufr (va dusmaniason ʙar Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam va ʙa sui imon ʙozgardand,) gunohoni guzastai onho omurzida mesavad va agar ʙozgardand va davomat kunand ʙar kufrason, donand, ki ʙo pesinijon ci raftore sudaast (ja'ne Alloh pajomʙaronasro nusrat medihad va dusmanonasro halok megardonad)
